I think the highest auction price paid for a sword is still the Kiyomaru bo=
ught from the Francis Festing collection auction in 1993. That sold for abo=
ut $450k to a japanese dealer (I think AOI-Art). So assume it sold retail f=
or a lot more. Other close contenders would include some of the blades sold=
 in the Manno collection sale in 2001where a Rai Kunimitsu made approx $320=
k.

e world record prices are for 1. a tsuba, 2. a
sword, 3 a koshirae etc ?
